Saint-Michel Boulevard /Everett Street
Saint-Michel Boulevard / [[Jean-Talon Street]][http://www.stm.info/English/metro/Saint-Michel.pdf Map] |}} '''Saint-Michel''' is a station at the eastern terminus [[Line 5 Blue (Montreal Metro)|Blue Line]] of the [[Montreal Metro]] [[Rapid transit|rapid transit system]], operated by the [[SociÃ©tÃ© de transport de MontrÃ©al]] (STM). It is located in [[Montreal]], [[Quebec]], [[Canada]][http://www.stm.info/English/metro/a-m64.htm Saint-Michel Metro Station]. == Overview == [[File:Saint-Michel Montreal Metro.jpg|thumb|left|A train departing Saint-Michel station.]] It is a [[side platform]] station with two entrances on either side of boul. St-Michel connecting to a common ticket hall. Unlike all other stations on the blue line, the station is only as long as the six-car trains used on the line; all the others were built to accommodate a nine-car train. However, the station cavern is long enough for a nine-car train; the extra space could be opened and finished to accommodate full-length trains if and when the STM decides to extend the line east into the boroughs of [[St. Leonard, Quebec|St. Leonard]] and [[Anjou, Quebec|Anjou]], committing to the line's original design. The platforms feature four abstract paintings under glass bricks, by [[Normand Moffat]], [[Charles Lemay]], [[LaurÃ©at Marois]], and [[Marcelin Cardinal]]. ==Origin of name== [[File:Saint-Michel Station Montreal Metro.jpg|thumb|left|Saint-Michel Metro station west entrance]] Saint-Michel metro station takes its name from the street under which it lies, boulevard Saint-Michel, named by at least the late eighteenth century for the former [[Saint-Michel, district|Ville Saint-Michel]] within which it is located. Saint-Michel is the French Catholic title for the archangel [[Michael (archangel)|Michael]]. ==Connecting bus routes== [[File:Saint-Michel Montreal Metro Entrance 2.jpg|thumb|right|The eastern entrance of Saint-Michel station.]] [[File:Saint-Michel Montreal Metro 2.jpg|right|thumb|The platform at Saint-Michel station]] {{Main|SociÃ©tÃ© de transport de MontrÃ©al}} {{Main|List of Montreal Bus Routes}}
